website_summaries.verdict: A one-size-fits-most cover that won't scratch your vehicle.
pros: Security straps and an elastic hem keep this cover in place
Works well indoors or outdoors but is not recommended for trailering
Fits snowmobiles up to 125 inches in length
cons: The material is of good quality but is somewhat thin

customer_reviews.title: Do not fit as shown or described.
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered two of the XL covers for my two twin Polaris Indy XC's with the 129" track. They did not fit as shown in photo. The length fit was close to being perfect, but they were way to short on the sides, as they only cover half of the panels on each side, they did not even cover the steps on the tunnel and I do not have raised bars or a tall windshield either to keep it from fitting better on the sides, so I am very unimpressed, as I was looking for a good snowmobile cover that fit properly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: bad if you want to store it outside in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Basically a very thin, minimal cover. Very few attachment points (good if you just want to keep the dust off in a garage, bad if you want to store it outside in the wind, and definitely bad if you want to use it to trailer your snowmobile). It has a 7 year guarantee. I will be very surprised if it lasts a year as we store our snowmobiles outside in Colorado. The UV destroys nylon. Last, as the ad for the cover shows, it is designed to fit newer snowmobiles with snub noses. Ours are the older type and though we can make it work, it doesn't fit well.
customer_reviews.author: JOC

customer_reviews.title: but I was disappointed with this
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to cover my 2010 skidoo mxz TnT 600. The cover fit length-wise, but didnt come down far enough to cover the bottom panels of the sled. I do have bar risers so maybe thats why, but I was disappointed with this. The biggest disappointment though was the fact that the cover practically disintegrated on the trip home on the trailer. Two buckles broke and the back side of it tore a huge hole, making it useless. I guess I'll try to get my money back or a replacement with the 7 year warranty, which is partly why I bought this, and why I'm giving it a 2 star instead of 1.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Good warranty, terrible snowmobile cover. It really is too good to be true
customer_reviews.text: Everyone told me that this cover looked embarrassing on my sled. It was like a loose diaper on my 2014 rmk pro. I ended up giving it away and getting a real sled cover that fit right. And the guy that I gave it to loaned it out and it ended up being a shredded mess on his trailer after an hour on the highway. They may have a great warranty but I have no interest in pursuing a replacement. Owning another ill fitting sled cover that not only looks bad but doesn't hold up does not interest me. At least it was cheap.
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: Wrong straps but good quality
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this cover is very good, and beads water right off. Long enough for my sled as well. Better grab your own bungee straps is all because they definitely didn't give me the correct straps. No instructions for a snowmobile cover, just generic automobile instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Jlew

customer_reviews.title: Nice Universal Cover
customer_reviews.text: Great fit (XL) for a touring model sled; good stitching and "contour". Overall GREAT cover for the money. Comes with all the straps (elastic was plenty; I didn't use any of the straps) to place tension on the cover.
customer_reviews.author: michael Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these look great on the sleds kept the snow off and sleds clean Not very trailer able first trip down the road 4 of the buckles broke off the covers sewn strap plastic is not good temp was 25 out so they weren’t frozen. Back to bungee cords to hold them down
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy nyman

customer_reviews.title: Great cover
customer_reviews.text: Cover fit my Ski Doo Mach Z 1000 with windshield and body mirrors perfectly. Has clips and straps to remain in place. Did not use it to travel because I wasn't sure how it would hold up but that's just me.
customer_reviews.author: imonit

customer_reviews.title: not UV reistant
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these one for each machine both had holes inside of a year and were completely rotten from the sun at 2 years I am replacing
customer_reviews.author: Todd Fritze

customer_reviews.title: Nice material though
customer_reviews.text: Was difficult to put on a 144" sled. Runs small is putting it lightly. Nice material though.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Jonesburg

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: good quality cover, and a good fit on my skidoo.
customer_reviews.author: bdlk

customer_reviews.title: Does It's Job
customer_reviews.text: Fit as I figured it would for being a universal cover, but it does what it is supposed to and that is keep the snow or ice off when I'm not using it. I put it on a 1995 Arctic Cat Pantera 2-Up and it covers the whole thing.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Speed

customer_reviews.title: not fit for covering a snowmobile on an open trailer
customer_reviews.text: cover was advertised as trailerable. it got holes in it on first trip snowmobile was trailered
customer_reviews.author: Morris A Till

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: cover fit perfect n my 2007 Polaris RMK, stays nice and snug while trailering
customer_reviews.author: Tim Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy it. It wont work for you.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't fit an sled. XL is to small for the smallest sled. Will it might fit a kids sled, I have not checked that yet.
customer_reviews.author: Shadowmix

customer_reviews.title: Picture is different than real life!
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t fit snowmobiles it says it does. Picture is different from real life.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Ann Pause

customer_reviews.title: Do not know where they got the mesurment.
customer_reviews.text: This cover WILL NOT fit a sled up to 125 inches and is very short on width. Do not buy...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: True size - M
customer_reviews.text: not big enough for Short Track snow machine... barely goes from nose to end of seat
customer_reviews.author: Buys Prime

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: Nice product, however, XL Doesn’t fit my Polaris Indy 550 which is 110”. States 126” ;(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit for our 88 Articat Wildcat
customer_reviews.text: Fits great and looks a lot better than a tarp. lol
customer_reviews.author: Chandra Griesemer

customer_reviews.title: A good fit for my 98 Ski Doo Summit X
customer_reviews.text: A good fit for my 98 Ski Doo Summit X. time will tell how it last but a 7 year warranty should take care of that. thx
customer_reviews.author: L. V. Labarge

customer_reviews.title: They look and install really well but be easy with them
customer_reviews.text: They look and install really well but be easy with them. I ripped one trying to really lash it down hard.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice cover but not deep enough to cover the sides ...
customer_reviews.text: nice cover but not deep enough to cover the sides of the sled all the way. you could do more with a king size bed sheet. 2005 ski-doo mxz 120" track.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a good quality snowmobile cover
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality snowmobile cover. Have used all winter here in norther Minnesota. No rips or tears and it fits my machine like a good glove. I do not need to even strap it in which is nice when I just want to go in after a day of riding...
customer_reviews.author: Down2earth

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Did not fit a modern mountain sled. Way to small.
customer_reviews.author: boondoaker

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Terrible cover, barely fit over my 2016 Skidoo renegade adrenaline.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Lockner

customer_reviews.title: Good cover for the Price
customer_reviews.text: For the price this cover is great. I have trailered it without all of the straps and it stays on. It states in the packaging that you should not trailer this cover. It probably won't hold up to long journeys but I had it at highway speeds for 80 miles and it is still in one piece. Kept the road salt and sand off the sled. I bought another one because they are not the most durable covers. The price makes them easily replaceable. Fit a 98 Polaris RMK 700 Mountain King no problem I would say this is maxing out the covers length though. Fit it like a glove.
customer_reviews.author: Shad S

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Will not fit on a 120" long bumper to bumper sled. Would only use on sled up to 115".
customer_reviews.author: Dgtur

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great cover for the price. I'm pleased. Fits decent too.
customer_reviews.author: brett

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good overall cover that holds up against snow and rain..fits my 1995 Yamaha vmax 600
customer_reviews.author: Bellamyhunter

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, somewhat durable but not suited to be used as a travel cover... more like a dust cover, and has a cloth backer at the front inside portion to protect the hood and windshield from scratches. Good value and definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: James VanGieson

customer_reviews.title: Pretty okay
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my 98 xc700, It fit great lengthwise, but it didn't cover the tunnel, and the bottom of the hood. Was missing one of the straps but that's no biggie! I like the cover overall though,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Rain-X 805452 X-Large Snowmobile Cover
product_meta.description: Outsmart the elements with Rain-X branded covers, a respected brand that you can trust. This durable cover protects the sled from the harsh elements to keep it looking and performing at its best. All weather protection against rain, snow, dirt, dust and UV rays. Added security straps with non-corrosive buckles keeps cover in place. Lined with non scratch fabric to protect the windshield. Fits snowmobiles up to 125 inches.
feature_bullets: Seven year warranty included, the best warranty in snowmobile covers
Elasticized bottom for a tight fit
Fabric will not scratch vehicle surface
Full elastic hem for snug fit, ultrasonic seams, trunk loop, vehicle corner tie down straps
Attached five way vehicle tie down straps and grommets; eliminates need for cable/lock

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.5 out of 5 stars107 ratings3.5 out of 5 stars
